OOC: What if the ships didnt come through the atmosphere. The 
violator and Infecticon ship were warped in.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Allright. Due to all the complaints that we've gotten from the 
members on this battle, the council has thus far come up with the 
following:
> 
> 
> 
> 1. No teleportation whatsoever. This includes all the beaming.
> 
> 2. No deathglyders/tanks
> for the time being. This is still being discussed.
> 3. Absolutely no anti-shield weapons. No exuses.
> 4. All large ships must crash upon entering the atmosphere. Please 
get those two ships out of the air and into their permanent positions.
> 
> We're still talking about it, so things might change. These rules 
take effect immediately.
> 
> ::Slayer/Incarcinator/EndBringer/Demise::
> 
> Slayer dodges most of the beam, his arm being blown off. He curses, 
firing two blasts from his remaining shoulder cannon back at the ship 
that had shot him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Incarcinator is hit by the two shots from the Trainer base, being 
blown backwards. The beam almost hits him, but he doesn't notice as 
he tries to regain balance.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Roaring, EndBringer fires two more missiles at the Trainer base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Demise looks around, growling. He didn't have any good long-range 
weapons, so he couldn't really help much.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
